resources.string: The information contained in this application is for educational purpose only and is not a substitute for medical and fitness advice from a doctor, health care providers. Consult a doctor for advice about any course of treatment or medical condition.

We do not store, supervise and do not claim ownership on any contents created by application users. You acknowledge that clearing application data or uninstalling this application from your device could result in loss of all your data.
In connection with use of services, you are required to enter the details of your location. The information provided by you will not be shared or disclosed to anyone in any circumstances.

We have gone to great lengths to ensure that all medical related information in this application and the promoting material relating to it is correct. However we do not assume any responsibility for potential errors and misinformation that this application may still contain, nor for any potential damage or losses arising from relying on or applying the information contained here.

This application is NOT yet licensed with google play. You may use this application solely for your personal use and must not modify reproduce or distribute the software in any way or use it for any commercial purpose. By using this application, you agree to all our terms and conditions mentioned here.

MediFinder is a simple and necessary utility at present. The goal of medifinder is simple.It will enhance every persons attention towards their health. MediFinder helps to find best match for doctors,medicines and all medical related information. Pill Identifier and Symptom Checker, attributes of this application can be very useful in any individuals daily life. For more information :www.medifinder.in
Thank you for taking out time to rate us. Your rating is very essential in bringing the best out of us.
